noun.definition: A gift or payment to a common fund or collection.
noun.example: He made a generous contribution to the charity.

noun.definition: The part played by a person or thing in bringing about a result or helping something to advance.
noun.example: She was awarded for her contribution to science.

verb.definition: Give (something, especially money) in order to help achieve or provide something.
Help to cause or bring about.
verb.example: The stress contributed to his illness.

usage_examples: All contributions will be gratefully received.
His contribution to the project was invaluable.
